signUpConfirmation: You should receive an email soon. Please follow the instructions to set up your password. You can close this window.
setPasswordFailedMessage: This link is not valid anymore, try to reset your password using this link:
setPasswordConfirmation: Your password has been set. Now you can log in with your new credentials.
resetPasswordConfirmation: If this email is registered, we will send a password reset link to your inbox. You can now close this window and follow the instructions in the email.
verificationFailedMessage: This link is not valid anymore, try to sign up again.
